summary: This code starts a Streamlit app using web/app.py, and runs service/app.py in the background with a timeout ready option.

details.comment: This code starts a Streamlit app using web/app.py, and runs service/app.py in the background with a timeout ready option.
details.content:
# bin/bash
nohup streamlit run web/app.py &
python service/app.py --timeout-ready
